entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:19 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 12:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNE 35 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then north 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
